testcase.system-out: Scenario: Handling an invalid quantity &amp#27;[90m# com/skillstorm/03-update_item.feature:25&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[32mGiven &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32mI am on the Warehouses page&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# com.skillstorm.updateitemSteps.i_am_on_the_warehouses_page()&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[32mAnd &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32mI expand the details for warehouse &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32m&amp#27;[1m"Wood Shop"&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# com.skillstorm.updateitemSteps.i_expand_the_details_for_warehouse(java.lang.String)&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[32mAnd &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32mI click to edit item named &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32m&amp#27;[1m"Wood"&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# com.skillstorm.updateitemSteps.i_click_to_edit_item_named(java.lang.String)&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[33mWhen &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[33mI try to edit the item quantity to have an invalid amount "-10"&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[36mAnd &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[36mI click the submit button&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# com.skillstorm.updateitemSteps.i_click_the_submit_button()&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[36mThen &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[36mI should receive an error message&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# com.skillstorm.updateitemSteps.i_should_receive_an_error_message()&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[36mAnd &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[36mthe inventory item should not be updated&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# com.skillstorm.updateitemSteps.the_inventory_item_should_not_be_updated()&amp#27;[0m
